expect: close_lane.py gains L-reference warning; ops-research yields at least 1 lesson from 53 experiments

close_lane_lesson_warning.behavior: When closing MERGED lane with artifact=<path>: if artifact is JSON and exists, check for L-\d+ pattern. Print NOTICE if no lesson reference found.
close_lane_lesson_warning.trigger: artifact JSON with no L- citation → NOTICE printed to stderr
close_lane_lesson_warning.expected_effect: Nodes closing lanes will see prompt to link a lesson, reducing experiment→lesson loss from 72.9%

ops_research_harvest.finding_harvested: Value-density scheduling 8x FIFO (F-OPS2), guarded dispatch -44% collision, automability ceiling ~33%

close_lane_change.mechanism: Re search for artifact= in Etc field; if JSON exists, check for L-\d+ pattern; warn if missing
close_lane_change.false_positive_risk: Low — only fires for MERGED lanes with artifact=*.json that exist on disk and contain no L- reference

predicted_vs_actual.predicted: close_lane.py gains warning; ops-research yields >= 1 lesson
predicted_vs_actual.actual: CONFIRMED. close_lane.py now warns on lesson-link absence. L-531 harvested from F-OPS2 corpus (value-density scheduling 8x FIFO, automability ceiling 33%).
predicted_vs_actual.diff: Expected lesson from ops-research. Actual finding (L-531) synthesizes F-OPS2 scheduling policy finding that was buried in 53 experiments. Also discovered WIP cap finding L-269 already exists — de-duplication check worked.

f_is7_status.bottleneck_addressed: experiment→lesson link gap — now surfaced at close time
